about_the_game:
Weekends were made for racing, and with SRX: The Game it's ALWAYS a Saturday night!

The Short Track Asphalt Pack not only allows you to race a brand new series, featuring the Super Late Model, but it also adds 6 additional asphalt tracks! So, whether you're looking for an additional series for Career Mode, an additional challenge in multiplayer, or just some additional fun in Quick Race, the choice is yours.


* Drive the Super Late Model, with its own unique physics.

* 6 additional asphalt tracks you can use with both the Super Late Model and the SRX cars.

* Available for use in all modes of play, including Career.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: 64 bit versions of Windows 8 or 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 530 or AMD FX 4100
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 750 Ti or AMD Radeon R7 260X (Requires at least 2GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 28 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcards
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64 bit version of Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 9600k or AMD Ryzen 5 2600x
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1660Ti or AMD Radeon RX 590
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcards
  • Additional Notes: Supports DirectInput and XInput steering wheels and controllers

short_description: Add the Super Late Model and 6 new asphalt tracks to SRX: The Game!
